GSP31tattvmiu:3: / ato bhavati duḥkhābhighātake jijñāsā sā ca tattvajñānāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:13: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP31tattvmiu:14: iṣṭasyārthasya saṃprāptau ko vidvān yatnamācaret // iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:19: yadyapi śāstrīyamapi ahorātramāsavarṣādisādhyamupāyāntaraṃ sukaraṃ śrūyate apāma somamamṛtā abhūmeti tathāpi etadapi laukikopāyatulyameva /
GSP31tattvmiu:21: akṛte hi tadvadhaprāyaścitte svargādigatyanantaraṃ paripacyate eva tadduḥkham /
GSP31tattvmiu:22_0: na ca na hiṃsyātsarvābhūtānīti sāmānyaśāstrabhya viśeṣaśāstreṇāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhetetyanena
GSP31tattvmiu:22_1: bādhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ bhinnaviṣayatvena bādhyabādhakabhāvāsambhavāt agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheteti
GSP31tattvmiu:22_2: vākyena hi vadhasya kratūpakārakatvameva bodhyate na tu puruṣapratyavāyābhāvaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:24: tathā ca śrutirapi na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:25: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
GSP31tattvmiu:26_0: karmaṇā jyotiṣṭomādinā prajayā putreṇa dhanena devatājñānena putreṇāyaṃ loko jeyo
GSP31tattvmiu:26_1: vidyayā devalokaḥ karmaṇā pitṛloka iti śrutyantarāt ebhiḥ pitrādilokasyaiva prāptirnāmṛtatvasyeti
GSP31tattvmiu:29: tadamṛtatvaṃ svarga eva cettattrāha pareṇa nākamiti /
GSP31tattvmiu:30: tarhi dūrasthatvānna prāpyamiti cettatrāha nihitaṃ guhāyāmiti /
GSP31tattvmiu:31: taccāsannatvātpṛthak janairapi labhyamiti cettatrāha yadyataya iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:35: tathā 'pare ṛṣayo ye manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo 'mṛtatvamānaśuriti //
GSP31tattvmiu:37: yadāhuḥ ābhūtasamplavaṃ sthānamamṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyate iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:41: sa ca katham ? vyaktasya kāryajātasya tatkāraṇasya avyaktasya pradhānasya tābhyāṃ parasya tasyātmanaśca vivekena jñānādbhavati iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:46: tatra jagato mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ na vikāraḥ kintu prakṛtireva prakarotīti prakṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā /
GSP31tattvmiu:49: etadevāvyaktaṃ sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ vaiṣamye sati vyaktamityucyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:52: tatra prakṛtivikāreṣu madhye ādyo vikāro mahānityucyate sa etadbuddhilakṣaṇaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:57: ayaṃ hi kramaḥ prakṛtermahān mahato 'haṅkāraṃ ahaṅkārātpañca tanmātrāḥ tābhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni tanmātrāṇi punaḥ kṣīradadhyorantarāle kalalapariṇāmātpariṇatāni
GSP31tattvmiu:58: sūkṣmabhūtāni kusumasaurabhyena sūkṣmasthūlatayopalakṣyamāṇaṃ guṇavaiṣamyameva tanmātraśabdena bhūtaśabdena cocyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:59: pañca bhūtāni ekādaśendriyāṇi ceti eṣa ṣoḍaśako gaṇastu vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:63: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:66: ārṣaṃ tu vijñānaṃ yogināmeveti tadatra noktam /
GSP31tattvmiu:68: tanmātralakṣaṇāstu devānāṃ yogināṃ ca viṣayā na tvasmadādīnām teṣāṃ cendriyaiḥ sambandhaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:69: / evañca viṣayasambaddhendriyāśrito yo buddhidharmo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa eva pramāṇam /
GSP31tattvmiu:71: viṣayasambaddhānāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttau satyāṃ buddhestu tamobhibhave sati yaḥ sattvasamudrekaḥ so 'dhyavasāya iti jñānamiti vṛttiścākhyāyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:77_1: jñānasukhādimāniva bhavati citisādṛśyaprāptyā ca acetanāpi buddhistadavadhyavasāyaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:80: nahi puruṣāntaragataḥ saṃśayaḥ anumānaṃ kathanaṃ vinā vā jñātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:82: tathāhi upamānaṃ tāvat gosadṛśo gavaya iti vākyaṃ tajjanito bodho śabda evāntarbhavati cakṣuḥsaṃnikṛṣṭasya gavayasya yat gosādṛśyajñānaṃ tatpratyakṣameva /
GSP31tattvmiu:83: evaṃ jīvataścaitrasya gṛhāsattvena bahiḥsattvakalpanamarthāpattiḥ sāpyanumāna evāntarbhavati
GSP31tattvmiu:85: yadā tvavyāpakaḥ sannekatrāsti tadānyatra nāsti yadaikatra nāsti tadānyatrāstīti vyāptigrahāt
GSP31tattvmiu:86: evamiha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti aitihyaṃ na pramāṇamanirdiṣṭasvavaktṛkatvena sandehāt
GSP31tattvmiu:89: na hi bhūtalasya kaivalyalakṣaṇātpariṇāmaviśeṣādanyo ghaṭābhāvo nāma /
GSP31tattvmiu:90: sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāminaḥ sa ca pariṇāmabheda aindriyaka evetyalam /
GSP31tattvmiu:93: asato hi sattvaṃ duṣkaram nahi nīlaṃ śilpisahasreṇāpi pītaṃ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP31tattvmiu:94: kintu tileṣu pīḍanena tailasyeva āvirbhāvamātramutpattiḥ tirobhāva eva vināśaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:95: kiñcāsambaddhasyāpi kāryasya janyatve sambaddhatvāviśeṣātsarvaṃ kāryaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti kāryasambaddhasyaiva kāraṇasya janakatvamupeyam /
GSP31tattvmiu:97: kiñca tantudharmatvāttantūpādeyatvācca na paṭasyārthāntaratvam yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭapaṭau
GSP31tattvmiu:98: tathā arthāntarayoḥ saṃyogo vā bhavati yathā kuṃḍabadarayoḥ aprāptirvā bhavati himavadvindhyayoḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:99: tasmādyathā kūrmaśarīre kūrmāṅgāni niviśamānāni tirobhavanti na tatra tānyutpadyante na vinaśyanti vā evamekasmātsuvarṇādermukuṭādiprādurbhāva evotpattiḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:100: evañca mahadādikāryaṃ pradhāne 'bhiniviśate avyaktaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:101: kāraṇe sattyeva kāryasya vibhāgāvibhāgābhyāmavyaktaṃ kāraṇamastīti gamyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:102: taccāvyaktaṃ nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ vyāpnoti tathā niḥkriyaṃ kvacidapyanāśritañca evaṃ niravayavaṃ svatantraṃ ca /
GSP31tattvmiu:104: evaṃ vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhamoharūpaguṇatrayānvitamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi ca tadviparītaḥ puruṣaḥ sukhādayaśca guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:105: sattvasya prayojanaṃ tu prakāśaḥ rajastu tasya pravartakaṃ tamastu niyāmakaṃ yadi hi tamasā guruṇā niyamyeta tadā rajaḥ laghu sattvaṃ sarvatra pravarttayet /
GSP31tattvmiu:106: yathā sattvaṃ rajastamasī abhibhūya śāntā vṛttimadhigacchati yathā ca rajaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya ghorāṃ tathā tamaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya mūḍhāmiti /
GSP31tattvmiu:107: yadyapyete parasparaṃ virodhaśīlāḥ tathāpi yathā vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ parasparavirodhinaḥ śarīradhāraṇarūpaikakāryakāriṇaḥ evamete 'pi /
GSP31tattvmiu:108: evaṃ sukhahetutvātsattvaṃ sukhātmakaṃ duḥkhahetutvādduḥkhātmakaṃ rajaḥ yanmohakaṃ tattamaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:109: te ca sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ parasparavirodhinaḥ svānurūpāṇyeva parasparaṃ viruddhāni sukhaduḥkhamohātmakāni nimittāni kalpayanti /
GSP31tattvmiu:110: tathāhi ekaiva strī svāminaṃ prati sukharūpasadbhāvāttaṃ sukhākaroti sapatnīstu duḥkhākaroti evamatrāpyekasyāpi nimittabhedādbhedaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:112: sargādau tu pariṇāmasvabhāvā guṇāḥ kṣaṇamapyapariṇamayya na tiṣṭhantīti sattvaṃ sattvarūpatayā rajo rajorūpatayā tamastamorūpatayā pravarttate /
GSP31tattvmiu:113: yathāhi ghanavimuktajalānāṃ jambīrakaravīranārikerādyāśrayabhedādasti bhedaḥ evamekarūpāṇāmapi guṇānāṃ pratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣādanekarūpatā /
GSP31tattvmiu:117: kiñca yathā rathādi yaṃtryādinādhiṣṭhitaṃ evaṃ triguṇātmakamapi pareṇa kenacidadhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ yuktam /
GSP31tattvmiu:118: sa cātmā pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ na hyekasmin sukhini sarve sukhinaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:119: / sa cāyaṃ puruṣaḥ sākṣī ca bhavati prakṛtirhi svaviṣayacaritaṃ puruṣāya
GSP31tattvmiu:121: tathāhi loke arthipratyarthinau vivādaviṣayaṃ sākṣiṇe darśayataḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:125: ata evātriguṇatvānmadhyastho 'pi bhavati sukhī hi sukhe tṛpyan duḥkhī dviṣan madhyastho na bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:128: yadyapi cetano 'haṃ karomīti kṛticaitanyayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate tathāpi puruṣapradhānādisambandhātpuruṣacaitanyamavyakte guṇakartṛtvaṃ ca puruṣe upacaryate /
GSP31tattvmiu:129_0: bhogyaṃ hi pradhānaṃ bhoktāramantareṇa na saṃbhavati iti bhavati tasya bhoktrapekṣā
GSP31tattvmiu:129_1: puruṣastu bhogyena pradhānena saṃyuktastadgataṃ duḥkhamātmanyabhimanyamānaḥ kaivalyaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:130_0: tacca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātinibandhanam na ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiḥ pradhānamantareṇeti
GSP31tattvmiu:130_1: kaivalyārthaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānamapekṣata iti tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ ata eva saṃyogo na mahadādisargamantareṇa
GSP31tattvmiu:130_2: bhogāya kaivalyāya ca paryāpta iti saṃyoga eva bhogāpavargārthaṃ sargaṃ karotīti //
GSP31tattvmiu:135: tathāhi sarvo 'pi vyavahartā 'hamatrādhikṛta iti abhimatya mayā
GSP31tattvmiu:137: tatra citisannidhānādāpannacaitanyāyā buddheryo 'yaṃ kartavyamiti viniśayayaḥ so
GSP31tattvmiu:146: tamupajīvya hi buddhiradhyavasyati karttavyametanmayeti ahaṅkārācca dvividhaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikādekādaśendriyāṇi tāmasāttu pañcatanmātrāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:154: paścācca vastudhamairjātyādibhiryo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa saṅkalpākhyo manaso vyāpāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:155: ekasmādahaṅkārādekādaśavidhāni indriyāṇi bhavantītyatra tu śabdādyupabhogasampravartakādṛṣṭabheda eva niyāmakaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:157: pañcabuddhīndriyāṇāṃ sambaddhavastvālocanaṃ vṛttiḥ vāgādikarmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādayo vṛttayaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:161: yathāhi parāvaskandāya pravṛttāḥ śāktīkayāṣṭīkādayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ śaktyādikamevādadate na parasparayaṣṭyādikam
GSP31tattvmiu:162: nanu yāṣṭīkānāṃ cetanatvādastu tathā pravṛttiḥ karaṇānāṃ tvacetanānāṃ pravṛtterayuktatvāttatsvarūpasāmarthyopabhogābhijña adhiṣṭhātā svīkārya
GSP31tattvmiu:163: iti cenna tatpravṛttau puruṣārthasya hetutvāt etaccopapādayiṣyati /
GSP31tattvmiu:165: karaṇatvaṃ tu śabdasparśādiprakāśanaṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādivyāpāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:167: nadīpūrabhedādabhūdvṛṣṭiḥ asti dhūmādihāgniḥ pipīlikāṇḍasaṃcaraṇādbhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiriti pratyayāt
GSP31tattvmiu:173_0: yathāhi grāmādhyakṣā karṣakādibhyaḥ karamādāya viṣayādhyakṣāya prayacchanti viṣayādhyakṣaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:173_1: sarvādhyakṣāya sa ca bhūpataye evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇyālocya manase samarpayanti manaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:174_0: ete ca buddhīndriyamanohaṅkārā guṇaviśeṣā guṇānāṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ vikārāḥ parasparaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:174_1: viruddhāṃ api puruṣārthenaikavākyatāpannāḥ yathā santamasāpanayanena prakāśāya militā
GSP31tattvmiu:175: nanu kasmādbuddhau prayacchanti na punarahaṅkārāya manase veti cenna puruṣārthasya prayojakatayā sākṣātsādhanaṃ pradhānaṃ buddhireva ahaṅkārādayastu taṃ prati gauṇāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:176: asmadādibhiḥ parasparavyāvṛttāni nānubhūyante iti śabdāditanmātrāṇi aviśeṣāḥ sūkṣmāṇi ca /
GSP31tattvmiu:177: ākāśādiṣu tu sthūleṣu kvacitsattvapradhānatayā śāntāḥ sukhāḥ prasannā laghavaḥ kecidrajastamaḥpradhānatayā ghorā mūḍhāśca /
GSP31tattvmiu:178: te viśeṣāḥ punaḥ tridhā sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛjaṃ mahābhūtāni ca /
GSP31tattvmiu:182: etacca śarīraṃ bhogānarha iti sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ ṣāṭkauśikamāśrayati /
GSP31tattvmiu:183: lomalohitamāṃsāni mātṛtaḥ snāyvasthimajjānaḥ pitṛta iti ṣaṭ kośāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:184: nanu dharmādharmanimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasya ca sūkṣmaśarīre 'bhāvātkathaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:185: sthūlaśarīrāśrayaṇamiti cet na dharmādyanvitabuddhyā saṃyogena tasyāpi dharmādyabhivāsitatvāt yathāhi surabhipuṣpādisambandhādvastramapi tadāmodavāsitaṃ bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:186: dharmādharmādinimittakaṃ ca sthūlaśarīragrahaṇaṃ tayoḥ saṃsargeṇa sūkṣmaśarīraṃ sthūlaśarīramāśritya devo vā manuṣyo vā paśurvā bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:187: yathāhi naṭastāṃ bhūmikāma vidhāya dharmarājo vā bhavati vatsarājo vā bhavati iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:192: tattvānabhijñasya puruṣasya vairāgyamātrātprakṛtyādiṣvātmabudhyopāsyamāneṣu tatraiva layaḥ rāgātsaṃsāraḥ aiśvaryādicchāyā avighātaḥ vighātaścānaiśvaryāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:201_0: tuṣṭayo dvedhā ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca prakṛtivyatirikta ātmāstīti niścitya saṃnyāsādeva
GSP31tattvmiu:201_1: tavāpavarto bhaviṣyatīti upadeśādau yā tuṣṭayastā ādhyātmikyaḥ pañcaviṣayoparamāt
GSP31tattvmiu:205: nanu sukhaduḥkhādayaḥ prākṛtā buddhiguṇāḥ kathaṃ cetane bhavantīti cetsatyam puri liṅge śerate sa puruṣaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:207: ayaṃ ca mahadādi pṛthivyādimahābhūtāntaḥ sargaḥ prakṛtyaiva kṛtaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:208: niṣkāraṇatve tu sadaiva syānnaiva vā syāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:212: nanu prakṛteḥ kartṛtve tasyā nityatvenānuparamātkadāpi mokṣo na syāditi cenna /
GSP31tattvmiu:213: yathā hi odanakāmaḥ pakvaudano na pravartate punastatra evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛtirmocitavatī na taṃ prati punaḥ pravartate /
GSP31tattvmiu:214_0: nanvacetanāyāṃ prakṛtau kathaṃ cetanadharmaḥ pravṛttiḥ tasmādasti prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā
GSP31tattvmiu:214_2: prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā sa ceśvara eveti cetsatyam yathāhi vatvavivṛddhyarthamacetanamapi
GSP31tattvmiu:214_3: kṣīraṃ pravartate tathā prakṛtirapi puruṣamokṣāya pravartiṣyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:216: dvidhā hi pravṛttirbhavati svārthāya kāruṇyāya vā /
GSP31tattvmiu:217: na cāptasakalakāmasyeśvarasya kimapi prārthanīyamasti sargātprāk duḥkhābhāvena karuṇāyā asaṃbhavāt
GSP31tattvmiu:218: kiñca karuṇayā prerita īśvaraḥ sukhina eva sarvān prāṇinaḥ sṛjet na vicitrān /
GSP31tattvmiu:219: prakṛtestvacetanatayā nedaṃ dvayaṃ kintu parārthaiva pravṛttiḥ yathā pāriṣadānpradarśayannivartate naṭaḥ evaṃ prakṛtiḥ ātmānaṃ śabdādyātmanā puruṣādbhedena prakāśya nivartate /
GSP31tattvmiu:220: phalābhāve 'pi nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi puruṣe prakṛtistapasvinī pravartate eva yathāhi guṇavānupakāryapi bhṛtyo nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi svāmini niṣphalārādhanaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:222_0: pravartate evaṃ muktaṃ prati prakṛtistu na punaḥ pravartate yathāhi vigalitavasanā
GSP31tattvmiu:222_1: kulavadhūḥ kadācitkenaciddṛṣṭā cettadāsau tathā yatate yathā na puruṣāntarāṇi paśyanti
GSP31tattvmiu:222_2: evaṃ prakṛtirapi vivekena sākṣātkṛtā 'tilajjāvaśātpunaḥ svātmānaṃ na pradarśayati /
GSP31tattvmiu:228: yathāhi bhṛtyagatau jayaparājayau svāminyupacaryete evaṃ prakṛtigatayorapi bhogāpavargayorvivekāgrahātpuruṣe upacāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:230: evaṃ ca kṛtādasmāttattvābhyāsānnāsmi na me nāhamiti śuddhamutpadyate jñānaṃ yadviṣayo abhyāsastaṃ sākṣātkārayatīti /
GSP31tattvmiu:232: nāhamityanena kartṛtvaṃ na me ityanena svāmitvaṃ niṣidhyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:233: bhogavivekasākṣātkārau prakṛteḥ prasotavyau tau ca prasūtāviti nivṛttā prakṛtistāṃ niṣkriyaḥ svacchapuruṣaḥ paśyati prakṛtipuruṣayorasaṃsarge
GSP31tattvmiu:235: ante tattvajñānasya tadānīmeva śarīrapātastu na bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:236_0: yathāhi nivṛtte kulālavyāpāre saṃskāravaśāt cakraṃ bhramattiṣṭhati evaṃ saṃskāravaśāt
GSP31tattvmiu:236_1: śarīramapi śarīrapātānantaraṃ tu pradhānasya nivṛttatvādātyantikamapi duḥkhaṃ naśyati
